short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Dynamic and Static' links to Azure DevOps 'work items'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After installing this extension, You will be redirected to the options page. There, you will be able to create dynamic and static links. Created links will show up on your Azure DevOps work items under the section planning.
